page.title: 01INTRODUCTION: QUINTON
page.content:
This block of land covers an area of 12 sq.km. lying about 7 miles South of Stratford upon Avon. About 15 miles to the North East lie Warwick and Leamington Spa. Birmingham is some 30 miles to the North West, and Oxford about 30 miles to the South East. Road links into London cover about 90 miles, via Oxford. Travelling times by car in 1985 are approx. London 2 hours Oxford 1 hour Birmingham 1 hour Warwick \ hour Stratford 15 minutes
Rail links northward operate from Stratford, southward from Moreton in Marsh (approx 15 miles) Principal{influences}in the area are {ARABLE FARMING, TOURISM, ARMED FORCES. It is part of Warwickshire.
